commandDescription: Retrieve profiles from the salesforce org with all their configurations even if you do not have the associated  metadata
folderFlagDescription: comma separated list of folders to scan for profiles. If ommited, all folders in the package directories will be used.
profileListFlagDescription: comma separated list of profiles to be retrieved. If ommited, all the profiles will be retreived
deleteFlagDescription: set this flag to delete profile in your local directory that does not exist in the org.
